event.description: Travis Jankowski walks.
Manuel Margot flies out to center fielder Enrique Hernandez.
Wil Myers singles on a soft pop up to second baseman Logan Forsythe. Travis Jankowski to 3rd.
Yangervis Solarte singles on a ground ball to center fielder Enrique Hernandez. Travis Jankowski scores. Wil Myers to 3rd.
Ryan Schimpf out on a sacrifice fly to shortstop Corey Seager. Wil Myers scores.
Hunter Renfroe singles on a ground ball to shortstop Corey Seager. Yangervis Solarte to 2nd.
Austin Hedges flies out to center fielder Enrique Hernandez.
Erick Aybar doubles (1) on a line drive to left fielder Franklin Gutierrez.
Clayton Richard out on a sacrifice bunt, pitcher Kenta Maeda to second baseman Logan Forsythe. Erick Aybar to 3rd.
Travis Jankowski bunt pops into a double play, pitcher Kenta Maeda to third baseman Justin Turner. Erick Aybar out at 3rd.
Manuel Margot flies out to right fielder Yasiel Puig.
Wil Myers strikes out swinging.
Yangervis Solarte homers (1) on a fly ball to right center field.
Ryan Schimpf strikes out swinging.
Hunter Renfroe grounds out, third baseman Justin Turner to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Austin Hedges strikes out swinging.
Erick Aybar walks.
Clayton Richard strikes out swinging.
Travis Jankowski lines out sharply to left fielder Franklin Gutierrez.
Manuel Margot singles on a soft ground ball to shortstop Corey Seager.
Wil Myers grounds into a double play, second baseman Logan Forsythe to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez. Manuel Margot out at 2nd.
Pitching Change: Luis Avilan replaces Kenta Maeda, batting 9th, replacing Scott Van Slyke.
Yangervis Solarte grounds out, shortstop Corey Seager to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Ryan Schimpf called out on strikes.
Hunter Renfroe grounds out, third baseman Justin Turner to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Pitching Change: Ross Stripling replaces Luis Avilan, batting 9th.
Austin Hedges pops out to shortstop Corey Seager.
Erick Aybar doubles (2) on a fly ball to left fielder Franklin Gutierrez.
Clayton Richard strikes out swinging.
Travis Jankowski strikes out swinging.
Manuel Margot singles on a sharp line drive to right fielder Yasiel Puig.
With Wil Myers batting, Manuel Margot steals (1) 2nd base, . Manuel Margot advances to 3rd, on a throwing error by catcher Yasmani Grandal.
Wil Myers singles on a sharp line drive to right fielder Yasiel Puig. Manuel Margot scores.
Yangervis Solarte grounds into a double play, third baseman Justin Turner to second baseman Logan Forsythe to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez. Wil Myers out at 2nd.
Ryan Schimpf singles on a ground ball to left fielder Franklin Gutierrez.
Hunter Renfroe strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Grant Dayton replaces Ross Stripling, batting 9th, replacing Austin Barnes.
Austin Hedges pops out to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Erick Aybar singles on a ground ball to shortstop Corey Seager, deflected by third baseman Justin Turner.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Hector Sanchez replaces Clayton Richard.
Hector Sanchez pops out to third baseman Justin Turner.
Travis Jankowski called out on strikes.
Logan Forsythe singles on a ground ball to center fielder Manuel Margot, deflected by pitcher Clayton Richard.
Corey Seager grounds into a double play, third baseman Ryan Schimpf to shortstop Erick Aybar to first baseman Wil Myers. Logan Forsythe out at 2nd.
Justin Turner singles on a line drive to right fielder Hunter Renfroe.
Franklin Gutierrez flies out sharply to center fielder Manuel Margot.
Yasiel Puig grounds out sharply, shortstop Erick Aybar to first baseman Wil Myers.
Adrian Gonzalez singles on a ground ball to left fielder Travis Jankowski.
Yasmani Grandal grounds into a double play, second baseman Yangervis Solarte to first baseman Wil Myers. Adrian Gonzalez out at 2nd.
Enrique Hernandez grounds out sharply, shortstop Erick Aybar to first baseman Wil Myers.
Kenta Maeda grounds out sharply, shortstop Erick Aybar to first baseman Wil Myers.
Logan Forsythe walks.

Logan Forsythe singles on a ground ball to left fielder Travis Jankowski.

Dodgers challenged (hit by pitch), call on the field was upheld: Blocked ball.
